sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { Line } from 'react-chartjs-2'; const WeatherItem = props => { const{ data, data2, data3, options, city, country, image, weather, date, time, temp, tempMax, tempMin, tempFeel, pressure, wind, clouds, humidity, sunrise, sunset, aqi, color, error} = props.weather let content = null var condition = 1 function setChartData(condition) { var chartData = null if(condition ==1) { alert(condition) chartData = data } if(condition ==2) { alert(condition) chartData = data2 } if(condition ==3) { alert(condition) chartData = data3 } else{ chartData = data } return chartData } if(!error && city){ content = (

{city} {country}

{date} {time}

{weather}

{temp}°

odczuwalna {tempFeel}°

max:{tempMax}° min:{tempMin}°

{clouds}% {humidity}%

{pressure} hPa

{wind}km/h

{sunrise} {sunset}

Jakość powietrza:

{aqi}

Sczegłóły

) } return (
{error ? `Brak danych dla podanego maista - ${city} nie istnieje lub zostało błędnie wpisane!` : content}
)} const weatherIcons = { 1:'/images/clouds.png', 2:'/images/sunrise.png', 3:'/images/sunset.png', 4:'/images/humidity.png', 5:'/images/temp.webp', 6:'/images/pressure.png', 7:'/images/wind.png', } const conditionColors = { 1:'green', 2:'lightgreen', 3:'yellow', 4:'red', 5:'purple', } export default WeatherItem
